handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
samasta-jagadādhāra-somakula-tailaka-madhurāpura-mādhava-keraḷa-vaṃśa-nirmmalan laṃkā-dvīpaluṇḍana-dvitīya-rāma-cōḷa-kula-śaila-kuliśa-karṇāṭa-rājavidrāvaṇa-karikkarikūṭapākala-vivida-ripu-durgga-marddhana-vīra-gaṇṭagopāla-vipina-dāvada-hana kāñcīpura-varādīśvara-gaṇapati hariṇa śārdūḷa-nellūr pura-viracita-vīrābhiṣeka-praṇata-rājādhirāja-paramēśvara-tri-bhuvaṉa-c-cakra-vartti-śrī-sundara-pāṇḍya-devar tiru-malai-nāṭṭu tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟattu Uṭaiyār tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉār-kōyil tāṉa cuntara-pāṇṭi ṭataṟkum Amutu-paṭi cāttu-paṭi Uḷḷuṭṭu
vēṇṭum nitta-nimantaṅkaḷukkum tirunāḷ Eḻunt-aruḷa vēṇṭuvaṉavukkum kōṉāṭ-āṉa kaṭal-aṭaiyātu-Ilaṅkai-koṇṭa-cōḻa-vaḷanāṭṭu teṉkō-nāṭṭu Iṭaiyāṟṟūr ṉāṉk' ellaikk' uṭ-p-paṭṭa nīr-nilamum nañ-cey puṉ-ceyum nattamum natta-pāḻum kuḷamum kuḷa-p-parippum Uṭ-p-paṭṭa nilattil paḻan tēva-tāṉamum paḷḷi-c-cantamum brāhmaṇa-Iṟai-y-iliyum nīkki Uḷḷa nilattukku Iṟukkum kaṭamaiyum Antarāyamum taruvatāṉa Accum kāriya-v-ārāṭcciyum veṭṭi-pāṭṭamum pañcu-piliyu ṭṭamum Iṭai-y-variyum Iṉa-variyum poṉ-variyum Uṭ-paṭa maṟṟu
m Eppēṟpaṭṭa Iṟaikaḷum Aṇṇāḻvikkup patiṉ-āṟ-āvatu mutal tavirttu tēvar tāṉa Iṟai-y-ili-y-āka- tantu Iṉ-ṉāṭṭil puravilum variyilum kaḻippat' āka coṉṉōm

Ivv-ōlai piṭi-pāṭ-āka koṇṭu candrāditya-vaṟ celvat-āka-k kallilum cempilum veṭṭi Ivv-ūr ṉāṉk' ellaiyilum tiru-c-cūla-stāpanam paṇṇi-k kai-y-koṇṭ' aṉupavikka Ippaṭikku muttūṟṟu-kūṟṟa-ṉāṭṭu Antaṉūrā -āka mpūr-uṭaiyāṉ vaṇṭuvarāpati vīṟṟ-iruṉta peru nāḷ
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
